name: Capital City
description:
Discover the unpleasant truth of this city as you navigate your way through back allies, dark sewers, and abandoned structures in an attempt to reach the capital.

In the class I made this project for, we were each assigned a tarot card as inspiration. I was given the Emperor card and decided to base my experience off the card in its reverse position. I wanted to create a city that felt as if there was a large government overreach. With beautiful main streets hiding the true corruption found just around the corner. 

There is still so much I wish to add so I hope my intended theme is felt even now. 

Thank you for taking the time to look at my work.
